page.decription: The EMAIL_GET_FIELD() function returns a field from the header of an email message.
page.syntax: Data as C = EMAIL_GET_FIELD( Header as C, Field as C )

argument.name: Data
argument.description: The text content of the select header field.

argument.name: Field
argument.description: The field to retrieve. The following is a sample of supported field values:

page.example: DIM pSocket as P ? email_pop_open(pSocket, "mail.mycompany.com", "john_doe", "sneaky") = .T. headers = email_pop_headers(pSocket, 3) ? a5_email_get_field(headers, "Subject:") = "How are you?"
